name: Keep the Healer Alive
description:
Made for TriJam190 in 3 hours.

You only have one job: Keep the Healer Alive.

Using the three threat-generating moves at your disposal, you'll need to keep the slimes occupied and off the healer. If their HP ever reaches 0, it's game over.

There are 3 difficulty modes. Post your high score for each!

CONTROLS

  • Arrow keys to move
  • LMB to click
  • The GREEN button is a single target pull. Click a slime then click the GREEN button.
  • The YELLOW button is an AoE pull. Click the YELLOW button, then click again with the targeting reticule.
  • The RED button is a massive PbAoE pull. Move over the slimes then click the RED button.
  • Click the PURPLE button to destroy any slimes you've pulled. Be careful: Friendly fire is in effect!

CREDIT

Keep the Healer Alive is inspired by my many years spent playing a tank in MMOs.
